entry.title: An Eternity Together
entry.summary:
Author: BoggieBoat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,722Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Jason has never been good at feelings when it came to others outside of his family. He died before he could experience the classic "young love" mentioned in all of his favorite stories he's read, so to get resurrected suddenly and go through unimaginable trauma after reuniting with his family- he's not exactly "romance-ready", to say the least.So, what happens when he gets stuck in a never-ending time loop with only one other person? Will he choose to work with them to escape the time loop, and risk actually caring about someone who wasn't family? Or will he crack under the pressure of both reliving the same day hundreds of times, and knowing that he may be the only one of them to make it out in the end?

entry.title: Attention
entry.summary:
Author: LicoricexWitch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,837Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: You've always been obsessed with superheroes, ever since you were a little kid.You moved to Gotham all alone with stars in your eyes for undergrad before the cold reality of city-living set in. The streets were mean and people weren't as kind as they were back home. It was hard to make friends and you preferred to stay inside, making you even lonelier. You were a regular fish out of water, not a lot of close friends or family, living all alone--the perfect target for someone with not-so-nice intentions.They always said not to meet your heroes because they could never live up to your expectations. Or sometimes, they weren't a hero at all.

entry.title: The Black Widow of Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: TheMostUniqueName20

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,203Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 17

Summary: When y/n was 11 years old, she was enrolled at Gotham Academy under a false identity, placed by her Red Room handlers as a part of an early infiltration assignment. "Find out more about the Wayne family, get close to them, and take them out." But what happens when you get too close to the supposed enemy? What happens when you form genuine connections? What happens when you feel like a kid again? Forgetting you're supposed to hurt the Waynes, not be one? Well, the Red Room will step in and cut you out and start your training from scratch again, all while leaving those who now have a connection with you wondering where you are, where it went wrong, if you're okay.... Eventually, they accept your disappearance until you've eventually become a faded memory to them.   Until... 8 years later.....   (Use of y/n, sorry for bad summary 😅)

entry.summary:
Author: ElaineInABox

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,808Chapters: 2/15Kudos: 41

Summary: You weren’t looking for love, just somewhere cheap, quiet, and safe enough to get you through the semester. Jason Todd wasn’t looking for company, just a roommate who wouldn’t ask questions about why he came home at two AM bloody and bruised.But in a cramped apartment in Crime Alley, between burnt coffee, leaky ceilings, and the soft hum of the city that never sleeps, the silence between you starts to change. What begins as survival becomes something quieter, steadier—something that almost feels like home.

entry.title: let me teach you
entry.summary:
Author: flourishedpeony

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,006Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 29

Summary: “Okay,“ you said finally. “But I’m still not ready to actually ride today. Can we just—... sit here for a while longer?” Jason’s smile was soft and understanding. “Yeah. We can sit here as long as you want.” And if his hand somehow found yours while you sat there in the fading afternoon light, both of you pretending to watch the sunset instead of stealing glances at each other, well—that was just another part of the lesson. Some things, you realized, were worth the risk of falling. Or,Jason teaches you how to ride a motorcycle.

entry.title: White Rabbit [Jason Todd]
entry.summary:
Author: thelonelywriter__111

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,716Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 16

Summary: She looked up at him with those kind, trusting eyes, the only kind of eyes that had ever looked at Jason Todd without fear nor indifference, and asked, almost shyly, “Do you ever let anyone take care of you, Jason?” The question was simple, almost naive. But it struck through his armor and right into his heart like a bullet he hadn’t seen coming his way. Because no one ever asked that. Not Bruce, not the family he’d clawed his way back to.Not anyone who’d lived long enough to know what he’d become. For a heartbeat, Jason was just a man again, tired, cracked wide open, trying not to cry into his calloused and scarred hands while the smell of cocoa and warm cookies filled the room. And in that fragile quiet, he realized he would do anything, anything, to protect the angel that had dared to touch his broken soul.
